name: graphql-compose-mongoose
description: Plugin for `graphql-compose` which derive a graphql types from a mongoose model.

scripts.build: npm run build-lib && npm run build-mjs && npm run build-es && npm run build-node8
scripts.build-lib: rimraf lib && BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d lib && COPY_TO_FOLDER=lib npm run build-flow
scripts.build-es: rimraf es && BABEL_ENV=es babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d es && COPY_TO_FOLDER=es npm run build-flow
scripts.build-node8: rimraf node8 && BABEL_ENV=node8 babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d node8 && COPY_TO_FOLDER=node8 npm run build-flow
scripts.build-mjs: rimraf mjs && BABEL_ENV=mjs babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d mjs && yarn build-mjs-rename && COPY_TO_FOLDER=mjs npm run build-flow
scripts.build-flow: echo `$1` && find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo ./${COPY_TO_FOLDER:-lib}$filepath | sed 's/.\/src\//\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.test: npm run coverage && npm run lint && npm run flow
scripts.link: yarn build && yarn link graphql-compose && yarn link graphql-compose-connection && yarn link mongoose && yarn link
scripts.unlink: yarn unlink graphql-compose && yarn unlink graphql-compose-connection && yarn unlink mongoose && yarn add graphql-compose graphql-compose-connection mongoose --dev
